subject: Re: Avion Australia- website changes needed

full_threads.body:
Hi Kosta,

Sorry for the delay, Categories are now updated.
https://www.avionaustralia.com/insights/

Hi guys,

Just following up on this? I have the client hassling me.

Cheers,
Kosta
@joel over to you please. Can we push this one to top priority.

Hi Kosta,

Ok sure no probs, I thought this was on hold due to the new build. All good, we will action today and update you once it's done.

Hi guys,

Can this please get actioned, its been weeks now....

Hi guys,

I don't think this has been actioned.

Can you please action this tomorrow?

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Joel,

Please setup those new categories as requested by client.

For the old categories that are no longer in that new category list,
please move the blogs accordingly:



Any questions let me know.

Cheers,
Kosta
@kosta Let's speak about this requirement tomorrow. There's a couple of questions we have about it. Cheers

Hi Joel,

Please setup those new categories as requested by client.

For the old categories that are no longer in that new category list, please
move the blogs accordingly:



Any questions let me know.

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

Just an update.

Regarding the insights filter.

About Us
Air Freight
Automotive
Chemical Products
Custom Clearance
Exhibitions & Trade Fairs*Fashion & TextilesFood & PerishablesFreight ForwardingFurniture & Furnishings*
Industry News
Land Transportation*Logistic SolutionsPharma & Healthcare*
Project Cargo
Online Visibility Tools*Sea Freight*
Social Commitment

The Items that has strikethrough are not available to the filters, unless
create a new category and assign the post to it.

The categories below are currently exists. If you want us to proceed,
these are the ones going to show up.

*Fashion & TextilesFood & PerishablesFreight ForwardingFurniture & FurnishingsLogistic SolutionsPharma & HealthcareSea Freight*

Regarding mailchimp, API key is needed to set it up.
https://www.avionaustralia.com/wp-admin/admin.php?page=mailchimp-for-wp

Regarding certifications, we have update the pages.
https://www.avionaustralia.com/certifications/
https://www.avionaustralia.com/about-us/

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Please see attached a document outlining some change stat the client sent through.

Can you please make the following changes and advise how many hours of resources it took the client so that I can bill them?

Logos are also attached that need to be placed.

Cheers,
Kosta

Kosta Galanis
Performance Marketing Lead
